name: Autumn Eladrin
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Enchanting Presence: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
traits.Fey Step (Recharge 4\u20136): As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
traits.Magic Resistance: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d8 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7+1d8 + 3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.
